name: Kill
description: An event where one entity causes the death of another living being intentionally or unintentionally.

name: Hunt
description: An event where an entity pursues and captures or kills animals for food, sport, or trade.

name: Attack
description: An event where one entity aggressively acts against another with intent to harm or damage.

name: Die
description: An event where a living entity ceases to live, either naturally or due to external causes.

name: Injure
description: An event where physical harm or damage is caused to a person or animal's body.

name: Arrest
description: An event where law enforcement takes a person into custody for suspected criminal activity.

name: Convict
description: An event where a person is found guilty of a crime by a court of law.

name: Sue
description: An event where one party initiates legal proceedings against another in a court of law.

name: Marry
description: An event where two people enter into a legally or socially recognized union as partners.

name: Divorce
description: An event where a married couple legally dissolves their marriage.

name: Birth
description: An event where a baby or young animal is born.

name: Hire
description: An event where an organization employs a person to work for them.

name: Fire
description: An event where an employer terminates an employee's position.

name: Resign
description: An event where a person voluntarily leaves their job or position.

name: Elect
description: An event where a person is chosen for a position through voting.

name: Demonstrate
description: An event where people gather publicly to show support for or opposition to something.

name: Meet
description: An event where two or more people come together, either planned or by chance.

name: Transfer
description: An event where a person or asset moves from one place, organization, or owner to another.

name: Acquire
description: An event where an entity obtains possession or ownership of something.

name: Merge
description: An event where two or more organizations combine to form a single entity.
